name: vega-loader
description: Network request and file loading utilities.
author: Jeffrey Heer (http://idl.cs.washington.edu)

scripts.rollup: rollup -f cjs -g d3-dsv:d3,d3-time-format:d3,vega-util:vega,topojson-client:topojson -n vega -o build/vega-loader.node.js -- index.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-dsv:d3,d3-time-format:d3,vega-util:vega,topojson-client:topojson -n vega -o build/vega-loader.js -- index.browser.js
scripts.test: tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && eslint index.js index.browser.js src test
